alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 3:21AM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST /noon CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The intense lake effect band will shift into far northwest Indiana, before pushing back east into LaPorte county and eventually Berrien and St. Joseph counties. Highly variable visibilities and local snow rates up to an inch per hour will cause hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
